scripts.dev-without-rollback:win32: SET NODE_ENV=development&&knex migrate:latest&&knex seed:run&&nodemon --exec ts-node --files src/app.ts
scripts.dev-without-rollback:darwin:linux: export NODE_ENV=development&&knex migrate:latest&&knex seed:run&&nodemon --exec ts-node --files src/app.ts
